songs.title: Don't Say A Word
songs.lastLine: It's yours when you sing along...

songs.title: London Town
songs.firstLine: Slaves in seas of soot we drown

songs.title: Lady Of Worlds
songs.lastLine: Shall reign over bitter white skies

songs.firstLine: I can hear the drums in the distance...

songs.firstLine: Wake up to the jive of the bell

songs.title: Friends
songs.lastLine: You know you're gonna be alright

songs.title: Paleblood Moon

songs.firstLine: When the final hymns have been composed

songs.title: I Am Pudge

songs.title: Hard Cash 2015
